title: AIFA Baby Cloud
shortDec: E-commerce platform for baby clothing with Firebase backend
description: A modern e-commerce website for baby clothing featuring a clean, user-friendly interface. Built with React and powered by Firebase for authentication, real-time database, and cloud storage. Includes product catalog, shopping cart, user accounts, and secure checkout process.

title: E-Commerce Platform
shortDec: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React and Node.js
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance and user experience.

title: Task Management App
shortDec: Collaborative task management with real-time updates
description: A real-time collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration features, and progress tracking. Features include task assignments, deadlines, and team communication.

title: Weather Dashboard
shortDec: Interactive weather dashboard with data visualization
description: An interactive weather dashboard that displays current conditions, forecasts, and historical data with beautiful data visualizations. Includes location-based weather tracking and customizable widgets.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A cutting-edge portfolio website featuring 3D elements, smooth animations, and interactive experiences. Built with React Three Fiber and Framer Motion for a memorable user experience.
